caption: Very nice outdoor seating
On my first visit, the waiter that entertained my order was very nice, friendly, and helpful. No hidden charges compare to other restaurants.
Good food, and good drinks! Super chill spot.
Get the Honey Badger! Awesome service here, super cool people.
The food was good.

This is the second straight Sunday where I try to make a delivery order at around 6 PM just to realize they are closed. I did call both times and they confirmed they were closing earlier for some random reason. I love their food but I wonder if their schedule will get back to normal someday, otherwise it should be updated.
The place was nice, but wings and pizza 🍕 was over cooked.
WONDERFUL
The restaurant is beautiful, the food delicious, the service was amazing. We really like it and will go back!
I spent more dough here than I was given to eat. The menu prices are too high for what you get. $30 for salmon??$39 for ribs?? $25 for rotisserie chicken?? Doesn’t make any sense to me.

My wife and I visited the restaurant and liked it. The pizza was larger than we anticipated. The food was great. It’s a nice spot for families with kids and casual dining. Teens will like it as it is owned by NBA stars.
First time here and we will be back for sure.
This is a wonderful local place to hang out. Awesome fresh food, and great service.
Very disappointed in my visit it was my first time there and was not what I was expecting
Friendly staff. Nice, clean environment.  Tasty food. Could use a little more variety though. Fries were GREAT
Tasty food
Had the veggie pizza and the power bowl. Both were amazing. Kevin was our server and he was beyond fantastic. He was so friendly and attentive
Amazing food and service. Would definitely recommend and will be back for sure
(Translated by Google) All excellent, very good service  (Original) Todo excelente muy buena atención
Loved this place!! Food delicious, fast  and our server was so helpful!! Definitely coming back again
great food,  rotary electric gas fired wood oven a hoot. great production and energy in the kitchen, like watching a ballet!
Nice restaurant with a good service. The pizza was great and the cheeseburger was juicy and delicious. Recommended!
Amazing!!!!
Innovative menu with top quality ingredients. However, pizza must be correctly cooked for that amazing  flavor combo (honey badger pizza) otherwise send it back!
The pizza was great and the service as well, $$ good atmosphere
Liz & the management team were very friendly & engaging. The bartender, Alana, was a plus! Very knowledgeable on cocotales & she makes a mean Old Fashion! 5 stars!
Delicious, delicious experience. Excellent flavor. Spacious environment and friendly staff
Food was fresh and delicious. I highly recommend this restaurant.
Basic food, basic service, premium price. I feel like I just paid $85 for a Subway sub, cheap steak, and a buttered artichoke. The 4.3 star reviews are clearly paid for by Heat fans (which I am).
More gas oven than wood fired I'd say. Pizza has better ingredients than average. The burger we tried was pretty good

$14 for appetizers, $34 for entrees? There's no indication by decor, hosting staff, detail (or lack thereof) in menu to.justify these prices. I'll come back next year when I have saved enough money to eat here...because this place is deeply unaffordable.
Great place, staff was wonderful and food was spot on. Thanks
Excellent!
Food is amazing! Love their little outdoor sitting area.

Food was acceptable,  service was okay. Had to wait for Silverware and appetizer plates after the appetizers arrived. My son started eating with his hands. COVID RULES were in effect and they did a great job with that.  Menu items were not available.  My cocktail was amazing and web enjoyed the meal. They need more food options. This could be signs of COVID....I would have given higher rating if food was spectacular...it was just OK
We sat outside although it was windy we didn't care.  Thebwair staff was very good. My partners pizza with goat cheese was excellent. My 1/2 chicken with baked potatoes and tostonies was great.
Take out Employee had a nasty attitude. We left with out ordering. Wade should fire him.

I had the distinct pleasure of eating at 800 Degrees Woodfired Kitchen for the second time and boy I tell you, what an exquisite experience! The presentation, staff, service and quality of food is remarkable. I absolutely enjoyed my time and will definitely refer your establishment to my network of friends and family.
(Translated by Google) Very good Hits  (Original) Muy bueno Éxitos
What a great first time experience! Amazing dishes and pizza in Aventura! The staff was super friendly and made us feel welcome. Can’t wait to go back!
(Translated by Google) VERY GOOD, THE PIZZA MARGARITA A DELICIO, AND THE ATTENTION GOOD  (Original) MUY BUENO, LA PIZZA MARGARITA UNA DELICIA, Y LA ATENCION BUENISIMA

This is a very nice place.  My family & I had a great dinner. We shared a couple of appetizers, chicken wings and meatballs which were incredible. We shared a margarita & a pepperoni pizza which was amazing. The atmosphere is inviting, open and friendly. The staff wears masks, gloves and sanitizes the tables between customers. The tables and customers are social distanced. Our server Jeffrey M. was awesome. This is a nice place to have a good time with friends or family. I recommend this place.
It was great went for lunch and what we ordered was delish, a must come back and try there pizza.
Server victor was very knowledgeable, he knew the whole menu by heart. Great serice and attentive. Definitely recommend having him as your server.
Probably the best burger I've ever had!
Great food and service

Spent my birthday lunch here for the first time and it went great. Had the salmon with rice and beans that tasted authentic along with a corn thing they had, that was even better! The service was very pleasant and welcoming. I also had a drink called feisty flamingo, excellent! Deff will go back.
Exceptional! A new GM Ms. Liz Tello very  professional and topped my experience off with great food.  A must  return!

800 degrees, 0 empathy :(  needed wi-fi urgently to finish submitting an online exam as I ran out of data. Expected an act of altruism from this restaurant but: no money, no wi-fi. Finally to get access to the restaurant's internet I had not only to order sthg but to pay first. It's so disappointing that in a ultra stressful situation didn't get much help. Fortunately managed to submit my exam, 23 seconds before the deadline. If I hadn't, probably the rating I left here would be different

Too expensive for the amount of food as well as taste... we had wings, you can only order 9 per order @ $14.00 and the fries that come with it were charged separately, pizza was soggy and tasteless. Anthony's Pizzeria has way better wings size, taste and options of how many you want to buy, their pizza is second to none and prices are reasonable for what your buying. The waitress was on point, professional and very kind wiyh me and my family.

Great place and even better staff! Went here on a last minute double date and we had such a great time with our server, he set the tone for our experience! And when the food came, it did not disappoint!
Famtastic ribs
GET THE COLORADO LAMB AND THANK ME LATER💪🏾💯✌🏾

We sat outside, it was 90 degrees in Miami. The upper fans were not working. We went to watch the Miami heat game, the restaurant staff couldn't adjust the volume on the tv for us to hear the game. My fries were toooooo crispy. I didn't even want it anymore. Then it was 6 of us, they couldn't break the bill in to individual. 800 degrees told is we had to figure it out. The gratuity was automatically put in $64 for 6 people. I thought it was 8 people then you automatically put gratitude in the bill. I wasn't satisfied with my night at 800 degrees, Dwayne Wade they have got to do better
Really good hamburger and pizza. Will be definitely coming back. Highly recommend. Delicious!!!

First off, the service was immaculate. We decided to go simple and get the all American burger and chicken sandwich. Both were great. The wings as appetizers were delicious, although the sauce on the side was questionable. The drinks were A1, perfect balance. The server recommended a caramel krack pie which was literally mouth-watering. Although I feel it is a bit overpriced for the food, the service makes up for it. Will be back for the pizza soon.
Key west pink shrimp!!!! Omg!
Amazing food the wings are great
Hands down the best Lamb in town 🙏💚💛❤ This neck of Lamb falls right off the bONe with this delicate crisp... 🤤🤤🤤 favorite plate in the whole city!!!
Server was friendly. The drinks were so dang good!!! Hubby had Frose' and I had the mojito. I had the crab cakes & he had the wood fire wings & fries. Will visit again.
The food is amazing, I had tha artichoke and shared a BBQ chicken pizza, both excellent.
Absolutely a place worth visiting, the food is fantastic and fresh, the costs are affordable and it is regularly well kept in here. 5 stars.
Ud's wings won't disappoint..pizza is great as well.

I must first thank the restaurant for being open and adjusting to the pandemic. I feel like whatever was lacking would probably be fulfilled if things were still a bit normal. Service was a little slow, simple things forgotten like plates for appetizers and silverware but provided upon request. It’s all outdoor seating for now, very beautiful but floods and forces you out when it rains. Food 7/10.

(Translated by Google) This place is spectacular, the excellent service, the food is delicious and very well prepared, a quiet place to share with the family and the best COVID 19 regulations  (Original) Este lugar es espectacular , la atención excelente la comida es deliciosa y muy bien preparada , un lugar tranquilo para compartir con la familia y las mejores normas del COVID  19
The best salmon power bowl I’ve ever had! Very warm and welcoming staff!
Great wings, quality pizza just a little greasy, nice environment. Our waiter was super nice and efficient. Would come again
Very friendly people
Food is really good and they have good beers too, definitely recommend
We had such an amazing dinner!! The lamb neck, pizzas, burger, and shrimp were delicious!! The drinks were so good too. Excellent service and a great ambiance!! Can't wait to go back!!
You must try the DWADE BURGER!
Great burger, wings and pizza...
Extremely slow service. Unprofessional and disrespectful staff. Rude manager.

800 of yummy! Food has the balance for those wanting to eat healthier and traditional. Wings amazing with the chilly and honey glaze. The white sauce that came with wings was ok not great. Bought the jar of chilly there... it was to good not to take home. Had there pizza. I love that you see how your food is being prepared. It's a bit pricey but worth the experience and food. Not a heat fan or care about owners who already got their dimes in a row.Staff is friendly. Kelly our waitress Super amazing. She listened and understood what we wanted and recommended accordingly. Everything we ate was good even the veggies. For our first time Kelly truly welcomed us.

Indeed best pizza ever. Not only pizza but the best customer service that you could ever receive. I’ve been ordering for them for a long time now and They never disappoint. Pizza is always fresh always hot🤤 Highly,  highly recommended!!!
Excelent service and food. Staff is friendly and helpful. Cocktails are amazing.
Food was good but not as advertised. We ordered the pizza with truffle cheese and there wasn't any but the pizza itself was very good. The potatoes were salty

Great food! Service was a little slow that night but other than that everything was amazing! *Update *2-15-20 the food was a disappointment this time. I’m not sure what happened because as previously stated the food was great. But I will not be returning ever!! The food didn’t taste the same , it was mediocre and full of grease.I felt horrible after .Tossing and turning. Sorry for the TMI but I was throwing up the next morning for the rest of the day. My BF didn’t feel so great but he just didn’t have it as bad as I did. But he agreed to never return! Maybe a new chef?

First, let me say that I feel that I am a Pizza Connoisseur. I love PIZZA and I love seeking out great pizza places. With that being said... this place absolutely ROCKS! I wasn't for sure, before eating there, if this was just going to be another pizza place with just okay" pizza. However
Quality
The burger at this place is exceptional! I throughly enjoyed it, my wife on the other hand had the ceasar salad with several dressings that were all made in house which she did not like.
The food was good nice open space the meatball was very good

Yum yum yum. This place is awesome. I had salmon and brussel sprouts. It was soooo good. I cannot wait to try something else. Also had shrimp appetizer the sauce was great. I will be back very soon to try steak!!!
Great service and food. Well priced. Josh did great job serving my table. Thanks for delicious meal.
First time here and the food was AMAZING! Simple fresh ingredients. My husband and I both said WOW after our first bite🥰 We'll definitely be back and recommend to family and friends!

Food was ok but very expensive for the serving size specially the chicken wings. The waitress asked my son if he wanted fries which we thought came with the wings but they were charged extra. Prices on dessert are excessive too. Not worth it for the amount we paid.
An experienced..
Good neighborhood spot. Excellent food and drinks. Outstanding service at the table as at the bar. Bar is stocked with high end liquor, if you are into that. Try their pizzas and half a chicken.

This place looks great, only issue is it's under staffed.  After waitting 15 min for water not to show up or a server to even come to the table our party of 4 people left.  It's too bad we never had a chance to eat apparently we were told by the hostes that everyone was on break till 5pm.  If I owned this place I would be very angry that customers sit down and are not served.  Good luck

(Translated by Google) It is worth going just for the croquettes they have. As good as in Spain and at a good price. Very friendly service but that's normal in Miami.  (Original) Merece la pena ir sólo por las croquetas que tienen. Tan buenas cómo en España y a buen precio. El servicio muy amable pero eso es normal en Miami.
Best costumer service, delicious food, nice atmosphere,  I will definitely recommend ❤

Honestly, I had a great experience. Convenience There's a Marriott and some offices that a relative of mine works at. - Food I ordered the red velvet pancakes. Let me tell you, it was AMAZING! It was one red velvet pancakes topped with yogurt and stacked with another red velvet pancakes. There was I think some kind of caramel / chocolate sauce on top. then, there was also white chocolate chips and strawberries. - Dessert We ordered the tres leches. It was pudding with ice cream. It was so good like don't even get me wrong. - People are reviewing bad because maybe they don't like dwane or because it was a small slip up. To the employees, congrats. Your restaurant is Gordon ramsey approved. :) vicky

Today’s visit was very disappointing, we waited nearly 40 minutes for a margarita pie and a vegan pie. I asked the manager regarding our order after I saw other guests (that arrived after us) getting their big orders before us and was told there was a miscommunication between the kitchen and the computer, no one had a sense of urgency. I believe our waitress was embarrassed because she stopped coming to our table.I used to love this place but costumer service has definitely suffered. Will not be coming back
Great place for pizza.
Where's the 10 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 button. Joey is awesome. The food is so good. Worth the trip.

I visited this restaurant with a few friends during happy hour and I really enjoyed it. The drinks were good and there was a lot of variety in terms of dietary preferences (lots of choices of vegans and vegetarians). Customer service was excellent. I will definitely be back!

This place is great in more ways than I have time to explain. The menu is rich in variety; the quality of the food, it's preperation and presentation is top-notch; I haven't experienced service this fast, efficient and helpful in almost a decade. The prices are more than reasonable. The decor is industrial and stylish, but even with concrete floors, exposed vents and open ceilings, the sound level is remarkably low. Easily one of the best meals that I have experienced in South Florida. I highly recommend this restaurant if you're in the Aventura area for any reason.
The atmosphere is better than the food which isn't bad but they were out of a lot of things the night we were there the pizza pretty good the burgers are better.

Great vibe, fun place with lots of comfort food, delicious salads and great menu variety. Not fancy, casual dining, great for lunches! We had a reunion yesterday there and the service and food were both very good.
Off the chain

There are a million restaurants in Aventura/north Miami and we went there three times in two weeks. Twice for dinner and once for lunch. We love the vibes, and the friendly service - in particular Calvin who is a terrific server, friendly and helpful. Genuine hospitality. The hospitality comes from the top down at this restaurant which is why it has such a great culture; from the director of operations, Joey, to the supervisor GG, friendliness and execution is perfect. Well done! Until next year!

Nice place, mediocre pizza. A pizza should be an harmonic balance of tomato and cheese. Hiding the the sauce under a sea of mozzarella shows a total lack of confidence on the sauce. You should never do that in a pizza, unless you like your cheese with more cheese on it, and really hate tomatoes. A neapolitan pizza is pure Mediterranean pride, and it should be made only by experts.

The ribs are amazing here... The vegan cheese on the mushroom pizza with Arugula is honestly the best vegan cheese I've had... who needs real cheese when you have that one.... the service was excellent and charming.
We ordered a Vegan Power Bowl, a Pizza Fritada and a burger. All if the food was fresh and tastes good. Service was friendly and fast. Good location with adequate parking.

Date night with my husband and I, and of course I wanted to try Dwayne Wade and Haslems restaurant.  My waitress was very nice , really attentive even though we sat on the patio and she seemed to have all the incoming tables for that shift she always made sure we were ok. Here is were the restaurant gets a 1 star because of the chef on duty. My husband ordered a medium + steak and it cane out well done .  Our waitress offered to have it re cooked but she asked we put it on a separate plate and my husband can eat his sides until it came back out . I ordered the filet snapper . The rice was really good but the snapper had way too many bones in it . Like the chef that came out and told us that fish has bones like we were confused. I understand it has bones and you can’t get all of them but this was more then two bones sir! And before you want to shout how much of a 30 years experience chef you are you might want to teach your line cooks how to filet a fish properly! And the Southwest shrimp was way to salty and to much sauce made the bread soggy . I paid for my my app and 2 rounds of drinks not because of the food but the chefs attitude. He turned a 300$ table into $80 . Fortunately our night was saved by international smoke house right up the street. Great service great food great drinks.
First time at that restaurant tried the chicken wings but I was surprised about the taste wasn't that good. But there customer service I gave them A plus everyone was extremely nice.
(Translated by Google) Normal  (Original) Normal
Great service and amazing quality good. Try their wings and “Shrimp and Grits”.
Great Wings and Burgers!

I stopped by here for happy hour on a random weekday. I didn't realize this was D. Wayde's restaurant venture with Udonis Haslem until I saw the article on the wall. I heard he opened a restaurant in Aventura but had no idea this was the one LOL. :) I actually was just searching on Yelp for happy hour around the area outside of the mall.  I walked in and sat at the corner of the bar. It was slow but there were about 5 or 6 people sitting down and it kinda felt awkward. There was no music in the background and nobody was really talking so it wasn't lively, to say the least. At least the bartender greeted me with a smile and took my order right away. I got the UD's Wings (Calabrian Chile with creamy gorgonzola dip) and the Baby Back Ribs. Both were pretty good. The wings were flavorful and the ribs were very tender. They were affordable too. Just less than $10 each. For drinks, I just got Wynwood La Rubia draft for $5 but they do have select cocktails on HH as well for $7.  For now, 4 stars until I try the rest of the food but from browsing the regular menu, it ain't cheap.  Apps average around $15 and the entrees are about $35 per dish. Maybe I'll try the pizza next time but they are about $17 so hopefully, one pie is big enough. Plus they also offer Fireman Derek's pies for dessert so that's something to consider.
Food was great! Location is beautiful!
Good pizza, good service
Fresh ingredients. Upscale menu
Good food. Good ambient. Good service.
Great food...very pleasant HAPPY hour supervisor... I think her name was Gigi...super sweet and super lovely person. She worked at the bar...made us some great drinks.

(Translated by Google) Good food you can see how they cook and prepare pizzas and food in general from where one is focused good price and good taste  (Original) Buena comida se puede ver el como cocinan y preparan las pizzas y la comida en general desde donde uno está centrado buen precio y buen sabor
I loved it. It was a wonderful date night
The food tastes great and good vide. The staff was super nice and attentive. Love this place. Will definitely return. The taste all so good and flavorful.
The food was delicious and the atmosphere is fun. It is super clean and the staff is friendly. It is a little pricy, but then again it is in Aventura 😎😎😎
Every single dish we ordered was delicious! Even bought a bottle of their special calabrian chilli sauce

I did not know what to expect from a fairly new establishment but I must say my pizza was superb and the service I received from G-G was second to none! Everything she recommended was absolutely delicious both food and drinks! Just ask her to make you an original and I guarantee you she will deliver
Good hamburgers, big portions, nice ambiance
Amazing everything hands down service,  food, design, everything about this place is phenomenal i would recommend it to anyone any time.
Different flavors of pizzas! Amazing place!
Great, nice staff! Really good pizza. Definitely my favorite pizza place in Miami!
Service was slow took 40 min to get a burger and prime rib french dip sandwich.  Ok place if you're not in a rush
Great pizza, great service.

Not what I expected. It's a pizza burger wing place that adds different cheeses to dishes and a higher price. I ordered the Barzino fish which is an alleged European bass. Fish was not well cooked and being that I and most of Miami are from the Caribbean and Latin America, we clean our fish properly by removing guts and tongue and gill. This fish was cooked with the inner gill blood. Gross. My other 6 guests had salmon (nothing to wow) and also the Wade burger which was just another burger rely with some exotic cheese. The shrimp appetizer was actually the best followed in close second by the meatballs. After that everything was just overpriced Applebees in my opinion based on the food, the seasoning and taste, and my knowledge and experience. You can go once or twice.
Good food!

This is probably one of my favorite happy hours in town. I like that they have an early and a late happy hour. The service is decent all around and the food does come out fast. The bar has some unique drinks. I tasted there frose' which was delicious and not too sweet. Surprisingly this place has never been slammed during my visits.  This place has the best wings I have ever had. The tender wings are drenched in a sweet, spicy, salty, savory sauce. They go perfectly with a hefty serving of gorgonzola dressing. I don't even like wings but I will come here for their hot, fall-off-the-bone wings!  Of note, the right side of the bar is a workstation so in order to not be in the way I will try to avoid sitting on that side next time.
Very chill, the drinks are good and service is good also. However sitting outside you hear all the cars passing .
Amazing experience and great customer service.  I love this place already.  Definitely I will come back
Excellent restaurant
Excellent food very creative and service is nice.
Delicious burger. Fast carryout

Ooooohhh the food.....  the food was superb! Nathan our server was professional, cordial and on point with his recommendations...  The artichokes, the Shishito peppers, Salmon....    I could go on and on.... The ambiance was relaxed and unpretentious...    a bar with 3  tv.screens and a quasi industrial dining room....   the place offers a terrace area for al fresco diners...  though in S Florida temps under 70's is considered cold so no one was using it....  Bravo ..800 degrees.  You do bring something good, I'd say great to Aventura...   different and quite welcomed for us the locals.....  the offering was excellent for adults and well suited for kids ...   our 7 and 8 year old... are already looking forward to return.
Food was tasty. I wish the serving portion improve.
Very good and casual restaurant in Aventura!!!
That place is FIRE! Food, drinks and service is da bomb!
Over priced dull food simple pizza was full of burnt ash from wood fire and im sure it should not be served that way great location somebody needs to go back to the drawing board with this one

It was my first time at 800 Degrees yesterday. I had an awesome experience! The music was a little too loud but whatever. My friend and I couldn’t decide what to order but our amazing server Nathan was quick to greet us and explain the menu and some of his favorite dishes. We went with Nathan’s recommendation’s and shared the UD Wings and the BBQ chicken Pizza. The wings were out of this world!! Our server had amazing timing and an eye for perfection, our table was cleared as soon as we were done with our our appetizer and he was sweet enough to bring us finger wipes. Minutes later our pizza was brought to us and it not only looked amazing but wow was it everything and more than you expect from a pizza. We turned down an alcoholic drink when we first sat but Nathan brought the menu over to our table and said he wanted to describe a few cocktails that are a must try. He was so sweet so we decided to try the drinks he suggested which were froze and the pre-game warm up 10/10. We were too full for dessert but the options sounded delicious so definitely will coming back and will make sure to save room next time .... food, service and atmosphere was great. Overall highly recommended trying this place out!

BINGO!!!!! From the first step it feel like we make the right choice. Clean and modern facilities with super smiley crew welcoming you to the table. 5-8 minutes from the order all the food was on table , warm fresh good looking and tasty food. We had no choice to go for desert that make us feel so good until the next time!!! Good job guys.

(Translated by Google) Very good. Beautiful and pleasant setting. Food good and price good. Very good service. Even if you are on a diet it is a good option as there are protein and salad dishes. I loved it.  (Original) Muito bom. Ambiente lindo e agradável. Comida boa e preço bom. Atendimento muito bom. Até se você estiver de dieta é uma boa opção pois existem pratos com proteína e salada. Adorei.
Food was delicious
Fantastic food! Incredible cocktails! Superb service!
Really good food. Nice big open space. Nice out door space also. Biscuts are a must.
Chicken was dry and expensive
Vegan pizza options
Good food, fair price, good place, good service. Many options on the menu.
Great food love it
My favorite brunch place in my neighborhood. They have bottomless specials. I love the chicken and waffles with a sriracha butter!! Shrimp and grits is amazing too!

Quality and service, does not meet the expectation that this restaurant is owned by an NBA player.  Management should really look into that. You’re in Aventura selling Woodfired Pizza. It “should” be one of the best. Change up the menu, and the customer service. You should have bilingual people working here.

Ok here is why i gave it a 3 star. We heard about this place of course on the news a while back they made it seem so nice. So Friday we decided to go check it out.. We get there no ine was there to greet us we waited a few minutes then someone showed up. We decided to eat outside the weather was pretty nice that night. The tables were not cleaned off properly still water mark ledts from the previous customer. We waited about 5 minutes for the waitress eventually she came very nice young lady. Let me not forget and add this some type of alarm kept going off and on for a while a bit annoying. We received our drinks i just asked for a sprite which by the way was watered done yuck. The menu was pretty blah not much of a selection. Finally we got to order I wanted rotisserie chicken but we were told they had no more chicken. 😕🤔 hmm funny there was lots of chicken cooking from whatvwe could see thru the window. Ok whatever so I went for a margharita pizza but after that the waitress goes and says if you want chucken you can order the bbq CHICKEN pizza we have enough for pizza. 😐 really? Ok .. Why not. So we ended up ordering bbq chicken pizza,greek salad (which was pretty good) and some wings those were good too. Personally it was an ok place not all like they said it was. Too much hype maybe because of who owns it I probably wont be back. Give it a try maybe you will like it more than we did.

Ordered shrimp and grits- grits were cold waiter & menu  stated dish was spiicy😏 so not true pay for bottomless drinks ex mimosa, beach bellini etc. Waitress stated to us bottomless drinks are only for 90 minutes🙃 what a disappointment. 1st and last experience 🙌🏾
Really good happy hour menu. $5 beer, $7-9 little plates. 5pm - 7pm
Awesome food and great staff
Terrible tasteless food
Expensive

I went w my family, this past Sunday, and we enjoyed every bite. My daughter ordered the Red Velvet Waffles. The order comes with 2 large waffles big enough for my husband and me to try 1/4 of it and it did not disappoint. Yummy. I ordered the Rotisserie chicken power bowl and it was all that I expected and more. Only thing missing was just a little more avocado but that’s a personal preference. It was a good sized portion. And let me tell you that the their dessert of Tres Leches bread pudding was worth the trip. The restaurant is clean and the staff was friendly.

Came a Sunday afternoon. The staff very friendly. It was kinda empty. The food did take a little to come out, no open wifi.... would have to ask for the password. You do not have many options, the menu is not big. And I wanted ribs, they said they were out for the day... My husband ordered a burger well done, came out a little pink ( then again the patty very thick ) but honestly the burger had no flavor. Not my best experience. Personally I would not come back.
Have the double pepperoni. It's double plus good!
Excellent food and great environment.
Great time and vibe! We got the best waiter also
Vegan bowl was delicious
(Translated by Google) Variety of dishes, good drink and service  (Original) Variedade de pratos, boa bebida e atendimento

Gigi is the BOMB! Great food, Great service ! I sat at the bar and took a chance , something I seldom do, and asked for some suggestions for dinner and to my wonderful surprise everything that was suggested I tried and it was awesome. I’m glad I left the hotel and came out for a bite to eat. Thanks again Gigi.

Excellent the roast chicken is a must... the pizza incredible .. the ntela dessert incredible... we'll be back
Wings were good but pricey

Nice atmosphere. Always great, friendly, attentive service. Really good food. Good pizza (NOT Chicago pizza, where I'm from, but good), good chicken, salads. Full bar...wine, beer, cocktails.  Casual but not "fast food ". Been there many times; definite   winner.
Great place
Very expensive menu considering the quality of food

I went to 800 degrees last week and the experience was very good. I ate a bowl of chicken with vegetables that was healthy and excellent. I really recommend this restaurant. The prices are reasonable.

Food was great! I had a DWADE burger and it was the best burger I had ever and I've had some really good burgers before. Sure it was pricey and expensive, service was great they were passionate and nice just a bit slow but not much. I love the wood fired taste on the bread it made a bit sick. Definitely would visit again just not very often
The D-Wade burger is the best burger I've ever had. It's a must try!!!
Really good food excellent service kind of a fun place.
I love Wade, so I expected a lot more variety in food, it's basically a few pizzas, one burger and a few other things on the menu. It is family friendly so I did enjoy my pizza.
$24 is overpriced  for just a  half  roasted chicken with only potatoes however the chicken was tasty and tender.

The pizza here is absolutely delicious! The staff is very kind. 800 Degrees is in a great location and has a great vibe to the style of its restaurant. The food is a little expensive, but it is very good.

Food was great! Enjoyed Wade's burger and UD's wings! Also had a great bartender! Yuyu was very attentive and was able to recommend a really good drink when I was not sure what to order. I will definitely be coming back to try the rest of the menu!

Came in for Saturday  brunch today! Had the Red Velvet Waffles with the strawberries. They were delicious! My husband had the Wade Buger, fries and the UD wings. All of it was amazing. We sat at the bar and had a great bartender, Yu Yu, who made delicious drinks and made great recommendations for what drinks to try.

Food was good. The Golden Fries were Great. The Rotisserie Pizza was amazing with Light Cheese on it. The menu is sorta pricey of course but dinner was good. The bartenders are a little slow but I totally understand. Would visit again just not very often.
Food was GREAT my picky pregnant wife loved it too so it was a double thumbs up!
LOVE LOVE LOVE the food, the drinks, the ambiance
Food was great and the portions are filling!!

I ordered the breakfast burrito. There was nothing special about the taste. It was so-so. My friends ordered their steak medium well and both came out well done. My friend that ordered chicken and waffles said her chicken was very greasy. The over-easy eggs were all well done. The service was excellent and so was the ambiance. That's why instead of a 2 star I gave a 3.
Great food and outstanding service. Loved it

Great comfort food, good portions
Best bread pudding ever!!!

I can only comment on the atmosphere because we did not get to eat here. After waiting for 20 minutes they wanted to sit us outside on a particularly hot day so we opted to eat at chikfala in the comfort of our Kia. It was a nice restaurant however very loud. That's all.
Pizza is one of a kind definitely would recommend it to anybody in the Aventura area service was good drinks are delicious highly recommended for a big party or intimate dinner

All the workers look lost, not organized. Forgetful! Food is good though. The brought out drinks out with the main course along with the kids drinks too. Forgot to put in a main dish for myself and tried to play it off like he was timing it out - had to share plates with my kids - didnt have 20 minutes to wait after we ate everything and were ready to leave. But they sure to bring the check and take your money fast.... not sure why this is the case with this place. Might give them another try in a few months.

A little expensive dwade burger, chicken wings, and bread pudding were amazing
Great food, menu is small but they have a variety of food. The chicken was good and so were the meatballs

Disappointed. My husband ordered a burger medium well and the burger wasn't cooked. My husband spoke to the server regarding the burger. The server must have told the manager because the manager came over to our table to apologize and offered to make my husband a new burger, which he did. My husband also ordered rice & beans. The rice was overcooked (mushy). The beans had no taste. I ordered the wings, which was ok. No big deal. While at our table, 2 families came into the restaurant. One of the families was seated. I guess when they saw the menu, it wasn't pleasing to them because they walked out. The other family walked into the restaurant looked at the menu at the door and turned around and left. Not a good look. Bathroom also needed to be cleaned. Toilet paper not placed where it should be. This was our first and last experience eating from this place.

I went there yesterday I ordered a chicken waffle with Benedict my mom orderd the chicken waffle without Benedict and my dad ordered a burger we place the order 10 minutes later the waiter comes says they ran out of chicken and waffles without waffles then she just placeses the same order as me 50 minutes later the  me and my dads food comes there is tiny chicken on my plate that looks like chicken tenders then 15 minutes later my moms food come with manger serving then my mom says she ordered what I because they gave red velvet which she doesn't like then the manger says you will like red velvet better then what I had so 10 minutes later manger comes my mom says I didn't order this so why should I eat this no one eat the food we left and went to the host then manger is chasing us then he says we don't have to pay.If he didn't do that I would give this a 1 star review.

Truly disappointing!!!! I found the food to be extremely overpriced, bland and unappealingly charred while the pizza was edible there was entirely too much wood residue on the crust and even directly on the pizza it was rather unappetizing. The U.D Wings are tasty, at all with the assistance of their dipping sauce which is a blue cheese substitute you will surely appreciate!!! The ginger ale I got was flat and there were a massive variety of cutezy miniature visitors everywhere that my children seem to come across from the time we sat down before we got any food. Which is no problem had the flies not attempted to sample all of our dishes forcefully. The tiny flying ladybug like creature yellow in color wasn't so bad she was very brief. I must say the carrot cake was interesting to say the least it was subtle and moist but a tad boring also, we wanted to be blown away!!!! For the love of basketball we may venture in once more on a date night, MAYBE!!!!! Thanks so much to the wait staff they were out of this world in fact at one point we had a handful of people checking up on us and bringing things to our table. I love that. Our waitress I was knowledgeable, bubbly, and attentive.
Great atmosphere, good drinks and good food. Owned by two local basketball greats! They have a winner on their hands!

I have been wanting to try this restaurant for awhile. Was able to stop by for lunch after my meeting. The restaurant is beautiful. I sat the bar and the bartender was friendly and gave great suggestions to order. I ordered the salmon bowl.. it was amazing! I wish I could have taken the dressing home.. everything was fresh and prepared with love. I will definitely be returning.

Excellent for dinner, in my opinion a bit expensive but it worth, the service was good

Service was excellent. My server was an older gentlemen with locs. He was attentive and very nice. Food was great! I enjoyed the meatballs, did not like the chicken croquette to much. Service was fast. Enjoyable for an out of towner
Love their food. Especially their roasted chicken and brussel sprouts. Just wow
Fantastic wood fired oven pizza ,they have a great menu,staff very nice,concierge lady very polite she smile all the time,manager very attentive

Save your money.  Overpriced and bland.  Had the meatball appetizer to start, and it was very bland.   Ordered the Chop salad.  Was drowned in oil with a splash of vinegar. It looked like scraps put together from other salads.  The tartufo pizza was very salty and oily.  Even the margherita pizza was bland and soggy too. It wasn't even that busy.  Might have been 5-6 tables out of 25 or so empty.  Some places dont deserve a second chance and this is one of them. Save your money.

Horrible restaurant. Save your money and walk/drive 5 minutes over to the Aventura  Mall and choose from any number of Italian wood- burning oven restaurants. Even the worst one (of which there aren't any) is better than this chain restaurant.
Great Cozy Atmosphere!!! Wish Happy hour was little longer

This place has the perfect menu, not too much. The staff is one best I have came across. Friendly, helpful, and those smile make you real good all over. Shannon was my waitress and hands down she was so helpful with my food choices and 800 degrees phone app to make sure I got my points. I will definitely become a regular here. When you first walk in, Kisha greet you with the softest and sweetest welcome to 800, immediately you know you're in the rite place. Can you tell I love this place. Enjoy this place everyone.

It was my birthday. My daughter said they have really good key lime pie. We came here for dessert after having a wonderful meal at International Smoke...We sat at the bar.  Bartender NEVER acknowledged us, and when he did he was rude,  the experience was horrible.  My first and last time coming here.

Absolutely delicious. Came for lunch. They have a solid lunch menu.  Menu is diverse, not just pizza.  They have a lot of high quality side dishes. We got roasted artichokes as an appetizer. First time there, they have a great menu of selections. Staff was very friendly. They had an inviting outdoor patio area to relax and enjoy with friends or family. Waitresses are very attentive. I was interested in their wood fired pizzas. They had a good selection of popular and vegan pizzas. I had their mushroom pizza with arugula, it tasted great. I paired it with a light Ale which complemented it and did not over power it. I had a very enjoyable evening there and would recommend it to everyone.

Great wood fire oven pizza and fantastic cocktails. You can skip the only pasta dish. The bread pudding is amazing. Service is friendly and timely.
